alert.note: Alert for West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 07 at 9:29AM MDT until May 07 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory today, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch tonight and Sunday, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph possible. * WHERE...West Central Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 8 PM MDT this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from late tonight through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
